During theÂ [[Battle of Castle Black]], Cooper takes part in defending the [[Wall]] against [[Mance Rayder]] 's forces. He helps load the barrels onto the ramps. WhenÂ Castle Black's inner gate is threatened by a [[Mag Mar Tun Doh Weg|giant]], he accompanies [[Grenn]], [[Hill]], and other black brothers to defend it. They successfully kill the giant, but all of the black brothers are slain in the process. Their bodies are discovered by [[Jon Snow]] and [[Samwell Tarly]] after the battle.<ref>"[[The Watchers on the Wall]]"</ref> After the arrival ofÂ [[Stannis Baratheon]] and his forces, though not seen Cooper is among the numerous bodies of fallen black brothers burned in Castle Black's courtyard.<ref>"[[The Children]]"</ref>
